content: 8 row make 2 per bird follow the for the short stems or 13 row for the longer stems blue tit wings patt in cloud break the pale green yarn and join pale yellow grey yarn using the two dpns work i-cord on the 3 sts for 4 more row cast off all sts making up follow the blue tit instructions making up for the stem weave in tails on inside of i-cord for each petal weave in cast off tail crocus using one cast on tail sew a running stitch along the cast on edge of each of the 3 petals to join decrease wrap this edge around the stem at the colour crocus petals change row pull tight to enclose the stem and make 3 per flower cast secure the yarn weave in any other tails on the on 4 sts using 3 25mm ws single pointed needles and lavender yarn start at the base of the petal spring delight wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 11 of 15 daffodil making up for the daffodil place the 2 petal layers on top of each other to make a six pointed star shape and sew decrease at the centre sew side daffodil petals edges of the daffodil trumpet decrease and sew the cast make 2 per flower * off end of the trumpet on top of the petals weave cast on 2 sts using 3 25mm in any yarn tails on the ws single pointed needles and pale yellow yarn start at the tip eggs row 1 rs kfb sl1 wyif 3 sts row 2 ws kfb knit to last stitch sl1 wyif 4 sts eggs row 3 to 4 repeat row 2 twice more 6 sts ⇨ note the other eggs row 5 k5 sl1 wyif are knitted in pale grey and row 6 to 13 repeat row 5 eight more times rose mauve instead of palest pink break the working yarn and transfer the 6 sts onto a make 1 per egg cast on 9 sts using 3 25mm single stitch holder * pointed needles and palest pink yarn start at the bottom repeat from * to * two more times to make 3 petals row 1 rs k1 kfb 7 times k1 16 sts join petals row 2 ws purl transfer the 3 petals from the stitch holder onto a 3 25mm single pointed needle ws of all pieces row 3 k2 kfb k6 2 times 18 sts facing you rejoin the pale yellow yarn and work row 4 to 7 starting on a ws purl row work 4 across all 18 sts to join the petals row in st st row 1 ws k2tog k2 k2tog 3 times 12 sts row 8 p1 p2tog p2 4 times p1 14 sts row 2 k2tog 6 times 6 sts row 9 knit pull through to cast off row 10 p2tog 7 times 7 sts pull through to cast off daffodil trumpet make 1 per flower cast
